mapper.select:
select a.TRAFFIC_TYPE as TRAFFIC_TYPE, a.VVIN as VVIN, a.CJSDBH as CJSDBH, a.DSJCFSJ as DSJCFSJ, a.DGPSDHSJ as DGPSDHSJ, case when (a.TRAFFIC_TYPE = 'G' and(a.DDHSJ != 0 or a.DGPSDHSJ != 0 )) then '已到货' when (a.TRAFFIC_TYPE in ('T', 'S') and (a.DDHSJ != 0 or a.DTVSDHSJ != 0)) then '已到货' when (a.DCKRQ = 0) then '未出库' when (b.NOW_DATE > a.DSJCFSJ and a.TRAFFIC_TYPE = 'G') then b.NOW_ADDRESS || b.NOW_CITY_NAME when (c.DCJSJ > a.DSJCFSJ and a.TRAFFIC_TYPE in ('T', 'S')) then c.VWZ end VWZ from dwm_vlms_sptb02 a left join ods_vlms_dcs_orders b on a.VVIN = b.VIN_NO left join ods_vlms_sptb22_dq c on a.VJSYDM = c.CPZH
VVIN in
#{vin}
and VYSFS != 'J'
order by CJSDBH
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO `default`.dwm_vlms_sptb02( CJSDBH, DDJRQ, ACTUAL_OUT_TIME, THEORY_OUT_TIME, SHIPMENT_TIME, FINAL_SITE_TIME, CUSTOMER_NAME, BASE_NAME, CZJGSDM, CQWH) VALUES
( #{item.CJSDBH}, #{item.DDJRQ}, #{item.ACTUAL_OUT_TIME}, #{item.THEORY_OUT_TIME}, #{item.SHIPMENT_TIME}, #{item.FINAL_SITE_TIME}, #{item.CUSTOMER_NAME}, #{item.BASE_NAME}, #{item.CZJGSDM}, #{item.CQWH} )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(dvs.CJSDBH) as totalNum,
toDate(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(toInt64(dvs.DDJRQ_R3))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(toInt64(dvs.DDJRQ_R3)))),'-',toString(toWeek(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME),9))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(toInt64(dvs.DDJRQ_R3)))),'-',toString(toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(toInt64(dvs.DDJRQ_R3)))),'-',toString(QUARTER(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)))) AS dates
YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(toInt64(dvs.DDJRQ_R3))) AS dates
FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH, dvs.WAREHOUSE_CREATETIME) in (select dvs1.CJSDBH, max(dvs1.WAREHOUSE_CREATETIME) from dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs1
and dvs1.DDJRQ_R3 BETWEEN #{params.startTime}and #{params.endTime}
group by dvs1.CJSDBH )
group by dates,groupName

SELECT COUNT(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME) as totalNum,
dvs.TRAFFIC_TYPE as groupName,
dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName,
dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName,
dvs.BASE_NAME as groupName,
toDate(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME))),'-',toString(toWeek(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME),9))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME))),'-',toString(toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME))),'-',toString(QUARTER(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)))) AS dates
YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) AS dates
FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH, dvs.WAREHOUSE_CREATETIME) in (select dvs1.CJSDBH, max(dvs1.WAREHOUSE_CREATETIME) from dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs1
and dvs1.SHIPMENT_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime}and #{params.endTime}
group by dvs1.CJSDBH )
group by dates ,groupName

SELECT COUNT(dvs.FINAL_SITE_TIME) as totalNum,
dvs.TRAFFIC_TYPE as groupName,
dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName,
dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName,
dvs.BASE_NAME as groupName,
toDate(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.FINAL_SITE_TIME)) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.FINAL_SITE_TIME))),'-',toString(toWeek(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.FINAL_SITE_TIME),9))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.FINAL_SITE_TIME))),'-',toString(toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.FINAL_SITE_TIME)))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.FINAL_SITE_TIME))),'-',toString(QUARTER(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.FINAL_SITE_TIME)))) AS dates
YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.FINAL_SITE_TIME)) AS dates
FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH, dvs.WAREHOUSE_CREATETIME) in (select dvs1.CJSDBH, max(dvs1.WAREHOUSE_CREATETIME) from dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs1
and dvs1.FINAL_SITE_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime}and #{params.endTime}
group by dvs1.CJSDBH )
group by dates ,groupName

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) AS totalNum ,
toDate(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME)) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME))),'-',toString(toWeek(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME),9))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME))),'-',toString(toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME)))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME))),'-',toString(QUARTER(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME)))) AS dates
YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME)) AS dates
dvs.TRAFFIC_TYPE as groupName,
dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName,
dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName,
,dvs.BASE_NAME as groupName
FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT v.CJSDBH, MAX(v.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 v
AND v.THEORY_OUT_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime} AND #{params.endTime}
GROUP BY v.CJSDBH )
GROUP BY dates , groupName

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) AS totalNum ,
toDate(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.ACTUAL_OUT_TIME)) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.ACTUAL_OUT_TIME))),'-',toString(toWeek(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.ACTUAL_OUT_TIME),9))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.ACTUAL_OUT_TIME))),'-',toString(toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.ACTUAL_OUT_TIME)))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.ACTUAL_OUT_TIME))),'-',toString(QUARTER(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.ACTUAL_OUT_TIME)))) AS dates
YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.ACTUAL_OUT_TIME)) AS dates
dvs.TRAFFIC_TYPE as groupName,
dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName,
dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName,
,dvs.BASE_NAME as groupName --基地 区位号
FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT v.CJSDBH, MAX(v.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 v
AND v.ACTUAL_OUT_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime} AND #{params.endTime}
GROUP BY v.CJSDBH )
GROUP BY dates , groupName

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) AS totalNum FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT CJSDBH, MAX(WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02
THEORY_SITE_TIME != 0 AND (DDHSJ_XT < THEORY_SITE_TIME OR (DDHSJ_XT = 0 and THEORY_SITE_TIME > toUnixTimestamp64Milli(now64(3)) ))
AND THEORY_SITE_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime} AND #{params.endTime}
GROUP BY CJSDBH )

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) AS totalNum FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT CJSDBH, MAX(WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02
THEORY_SHIPMENT_TIME != 0 AND ( SHIPMENT_TIME < THEORY_SHIPMENT_TIME OR -- 实际还没起运，但是 理论起运时间在当前时间之后，视为一条正常数据 (SHIPMENT_TIME = 0 AND THEORY_SHIPMENT_TIME > toUnixTimestamp64Milli(now64(3)) ))
AND THEORY_SHIPMENT_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime} AND #{params.endTime}
GROUP BY CJSDBH )

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) AS totalNum FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT CJSDBH, MAX(WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02
AND THEORY_SHIPMENT_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime} AND #{params.endTime}
AND THEORY_SHIPMENT_TIME != 0
GROUP BY CJSDBH )

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) AS totalNum FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT CJSDBH, MAX(WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02
THEORY_OUT_TIME != 0 AND (ACTUAL_OUT_TIME < THEORY_OUT_TIME OR (ACTUAL_OUT_TIME = 0 and THEORY_OUT_TIME > toUnixTimestamp64Milli(now64(3)) ))
AND THEORY_OUT_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime} AND #{params.endTime}
GROUP BY CJSDBH )

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) AS totalNum FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT CJSDBH, MAX(WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02
THEORY_OUT_TIME != 0
AND THEORY_OUT_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime} AND #{params.endTime}
GROUP BY CJSDBH )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02
SELECT COUNT(VVIN) from dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs WHERE dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME != 0 and dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime} and #{params.endTime}
select COUNT(DISTINCT VVIN) from dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs where dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME != 0 and dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME < #{params.endTime} and (FINAL_SITE_TIME > #{params.startTime} or FINAL_SITE_TIME = 0)
SELECT COUNT(distinct VVIN) from dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs WHERE dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME = 0 and dvs.ASSIGN_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime} and #{params.endTime}
SELECT COUNT(distinct VVIN) from dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs WHERE dvs.DZPSJ = 0 and dvs.ASSIGN_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime} and #{params.endTime}
